name: Local Conference of Youth 2024
description:
LCOY is an event initiated by YOUNGO, with an aim to empower youth through networking and knowledge sharing.🌐 LCOY serves as a significant platform for young people to engage with the UNFCCC process and meaningfully contribute to climate discussions.🌍💭
LCOY Nepal 2024 is an annual gathering of Nepalese youth, who are passionate about climate change and environmental topics.🇳🇵 LCOY Nepal 2024 desires to connect the annual climate negotiations to local climate action and turn words into actions, especially youth actions‼️
Themes of LCOY 2024
Building Capacity, Connecting Communities - Strengthening skills and networks to drive collective action for a healthier, more resilient future.
Children & Youth Engagement in Nationally Determined Contributions - Amplifying youth voices and actions to drive ambitious climate commitments at the national level.
Addressing Climate Loss & Damage - Taking action to mitigate and adapt to the impacts of climate change on vulnerable communities.
Indigenous Wisdom, Climate Resilience - Harnessing traditional knowledge for sustainable solutions to climate challenges.
